verses.roman:
yajñānāṁ brahma-yajño 'haṁ
vratānām avihiṁsanam
vāyv-agny-arkāmbu-vāg-ātmā
śucīnām apy ahaṁ śuciḥ

synonyms: yajñānām—of sacrifices; brahma-yajñaḥ—study of the Veda; aham—I am; vratānām—of vows; avihiṁsanam—nonviolence; vāyu—wind; agni—fire; arka—the sun; ambu—water; vāk—and speech; ātmā—personified; śucīnām—of all purifiers; api—indeed; aham—I am; śuciḥ—pure.
translation: Among sacrifices I am study of the Veda, and I am nonviolence among vows. Among all things that purify I am the wind, fire, the sun, water and speech.
